Package index

All functions

AddQualTag()
Assign Quality Tag to a Segment Based on BAF GMM Metrics
AnnotateSegments()
Annotate CNV Segments with ISCN and Gene Information
AssignPriors()
Assign Priors to Major/Minor Allele Combinations Based on Biological Difficulty
CalMedian()
Calculate Median Coverage for a Genomic Region
CalSM()
Calculate Segment Mean Adjusted by Scale Factor
CalSegmentLikelihood()
Calculate Marginal Likelihood for a Single Segment
CalbaselineCov()
Calculate Baseline Coverage
Calccf()
Calculate Cancer Cell Fraction (CCF)
CallMerge()
Merge Segments or AI Rows by Chromosome
CallWTModel()
Assign Copy Number Call With Model (Major/Minor)
Callikelihood()
Calculate Likelihood for Each \(\mu\) and \(\rho\) Combination
CallwoModel()
Assign Copy Number Call Without Model
CcfLOH()
Calculate Cancer Cell Fraction (CCF) from Allelic Imbalance (LOH)
CheckGender()
Check and Adjust Gender in GATK Segmentation Data
Checkmode()
Check and Set Mode-Specific Options
ClusterAdjacent()
Cluster Adjacent Values Based on a Threshold
ClusterModels()
Cluster and Select the Best Models Based on Likelihood and Copy Number Distance
CorrectBAF()
Correct BAF Values Using a Scaling Factor
CorrectGender()
Correct Copy Ratio File if GATK and Pipeline Gender Disagree
CorrectPurity()
Correct CNF and MAF According to Purity
CoverageQC()
Summarise BAF QC from CNV Segment Annotation
EstimateBAFbyGMM()
Estimate BAF Cluster Mean and Weight Using Gaussian Mixture Modeling
EstimateBAFshift()
Estimate BAF Shift Scaling Factor
EstimateCovSF()
Estimate Coverage Scale Factor for a Chromosome or Region
EstimateMinPurity()
Estimate Minimum Tumor Purity from BAF Data
EstimatePurityCov()
Estimate Tumor Purity from Coverage and Segmentation Data
EstimateSFVariance()
Estimate Standard Deviation of a Numeric Vector
ExtractCall()
Extract Final Calls for a Given (mu, rho) Model
FindTier1Models()
Find the "Elbow" Point in a Ranked Vector (Tier 1 Model Selection)
FixsegmentMean()
Fix Segment Mean Based on Gender Discrepancy
GenerateCombinations()
Generate All Major/Minor Allele Combinations for a Given Total Copy Number
Groupvalues()
Group Values by Change Points in the Mean
MergeAICheck()
Check Whether Two AI Segments Should Be Merged
MergeAIRow()
Merge Adjacent AI Segments Based on Similarity Criteria
MergeSegCheck()
Check Whether Two Segments Should Be Merged (Copy Number)
MergeSegRow()
Merge Adjacent Copy Number Segments Based on Similarity Criteria
ModelSource()
Determine Model Source Based on BAF and Coverage Information
ParseParm()
Parse Purity and Scale Factor Parameters for Model Selection
PlotCovDisCN()
Plot Coverage Distance to Integer Copy Number vs. Purity
PlotLikelihoodAndDistance()
Plot Model Likelihood and Distance Clusters as an Interactive Heatmap
PlotModel()
Plot Model Total Log-Likelihoods as a Heatmap
PlotModelDot()
Plot Model Total Log-Likelihoods as a Dot Plot
RefineCalls()
Refine Segment Calls According to the Final Model
RefineCallsSecond()
Second Refinement of Segment Calls for Cov/AI Profile Mismatches
RefineTier1Models()
Refine Tier 1 Models and Their Segment Calls
RunCallikelihood()
Run Likelihood Calculation Across All Purity/Mu Combinations
SearchBreakpoint()
Search for Breakpoints within a Segment Using BAF Data
SegmentMeanToOriCov()
Convert Segment Mean to Original Coverage
SelectCallpersegment()
Select the Most Likely Call per Segment
SelectFinalModel()
Select the Final Copy Number Model and Write Results
SelectModelByDis()
Select Model by Distance to Integer Copy Number
SummarizeMapQC()
Summarise QC Tables for a Sample
ai_bin_smooth()
Smooth AI Bin Values by Downsampling to Mode Proportions
band_plottable_female
Non blacklist region for each cytobands binned by 300nt for female.
band_plottable_male
Non blacklist region for each cytobands binned by 300nt for male.
binbaf()
Bin BAF Data and Estimate BAF Metrics per Bin

Non mapable regions of the genome

Categorize Beta Distribution K Values
clean_homalt()

edge_table
Detectable Edge table for cytoband annotation follows the 5MB rule.
gene_annotation
